entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:53 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:31 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 6:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: 7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 46 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then freezing rain or ice pellets beginning overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening then becoming west 30 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
